mapper.select: select * from cafe order by cafeno asc

SELECT *,
(6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(lng)
-radians(#{lng}))+sin(radians(37.4685225))*sin(radians(lat))))
AS distance
FROM cafe
HAVING distance <= 0.5
ORDER BY distance
LIMIT 0,300
